The Obama administration declared swine: or H1N1, a public health emergency six weeks before H1N1 was declared a pandemic.
Six months after the initial declaration: when more than 1,000 deaths had occurred, Obama himself declared H1N1 a national emergency.
The Obama administration: s public health emergency declaration came more than six weeks before the pandemic designation by the World Health Organization.
Obama: s declaration of a national emergency for H1N1 came after six months of the initial public health emergency declaration.
